attributes.action: Please put retail worker in first priority for COVID 19 vaccination program.
attributes.additional_details: Retail workers are much vulnerable for COVID 19 . They are serving UK by putting themselves in risk , so that people can get their everyday food. However they do not have least protection and it is impossible to maintain social distance as well . So to protect them and recognise their hard work and sacrifice government should put them in first place in priority list for COVID 19 vaccination program.
attributes.background: Government should put retail worker  in first priority list with healthcare staffs for COVID 19 vaccination program.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
